title: How to Make a Kirigami Paper Snowflake

steps.headline: Take a piece of rectangular paper as shown.
steps.description: Fold where shown in the image.

steps.headline: Cut off the rectangle at the end, to leave a triangle shape.
Fold the triangle in half again.
Draw the marked design as shown here near the edge of the folded triangle.
steps.description: Then cut following the dashed lines.

steps.headline: Open up the paper.
steps.description: You will have a lovely snowflake design.

tyn: A sheet of A4 white paper
text: Take a piece of rectangular paper as shown. Fold where shown in the image. Cut off the rectangle at the end, to leave a triangle shape.  Fold the triangle in half again.  Fold again.  Draw the marked design as shown here near the edge of the folded triangle. Then cut following the dashed lines. Open up the paper. You will have a lovely snowflake design. Finished.
